org.jetel.data.sequence

Interface Sequence

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGraphElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrimitiveSequence, SimpleSequence

    public interface Sequence
extends IGraphElement
    Since:
    31.5.2005 TODO To change the template for this generated type comment go to Window - Preferences - Java - Code Style - Code Templates

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Method which returns sequence's name (ID). It is deemed that all sequences are kept in directory and accessed by client's transformations by their names.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface IGraphElement
        Returns:
        sequence name

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String sequenceName)
        Method allows to set the name of sequence.
        Specified by:
        setName in interface IGraphElement
        Parameters:
        sequenceName - new name of the sequence instance

      • currentValueInt

        int currentValueInt()
        Returns:
        current value of the sequence

      • nextValueInt

        int nextValueInt()
        Calculates next value of the sequence (based on current value and defined step) and returns it. In general, it is not thread safe.
        Returns:
        next value

      • currentValueLong

        long currentValueLong()

      • nextValueLong

        long nextValueLong()

      • currentValueString

        java.lang.String currentValueString()

      • nextValueString

        java.lang.String nextValueString()

      • resetValue

        void resetValue()
        Set the current sequence value to the defined start value;

      • isPersistent

        boolean isPersistent()
        Informs whether the sequence is persistent - i.e. whether it keeps its value between different class instances.
        Returns:
        true/false (is/is not persistent)

      • init

        void init()
          throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Initializes sequence object. It is called after the sequence class is instantiated. All necessary internal initialization should be performed in this method. NOTE: copy from GraphElement
        Specified by:
        init in interface IGraphElement
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - some of the required resource is not available or other precondition is not accomplish

      • free

        void free()
        Closes the sequence (current instance). All internal resources should be freed in this method. NOTE: copy from GraphElement
        Specified by:
        free in interface IGraphElement

      • isShared

        boolean isShared()
        Is this sequence shared via an authority (i.e. server). Returns true if the sequence doesn't have its lifetime bound to the graph instance.
